title: Approx., eval., def. integral; L'Hosp.: Tabular

content.description:
NO CALCULATOR IS ALLOWED FOR THIS QUESTION.

The function f satisfies <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>f</mi> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mn>0</mn> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> <mo>=</mo> <mn>20</mn> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaamOzaiaacI cacaaIWaGaaiykaiabg2da9iaaikdacaaIWaaaaa@3B70@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>. The first derivative of f satisfies the inequality <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mn>0</mn> <mo>≤</mo> <msup> <mi>f</mi> <mrow> <msup> <mrow> </mrow> <mo>'</mo> </msup> </mrow> </msup> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> <mo>≤</mo> <mn>7</mn> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaaGimaiabgs MiJkaadAgadaahaaWcbeqaamaaCaaameqabaGaai4jaaaaaaGccaGG OaGaamiEaiaacMcacqGHKjYOcaaI3aaaaa@3F2C@ </annotation> </semantics> </math> for all x in the closed interval <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mo stretchy="false">[</mo> <mn>0</mn> <mo>,</mo> <mn>6</mn> <mo stretchy="false">]</mo> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaGGBbGaaGimaiaacYcacaaI2aGaaiyxaaaa@3A00@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>. Selected values of <math> <semantics> <mrow> <msup> <mi>f</mi> <mrow> <msup> <mrow> </mrow> <mo>'</mo> </msup> </mrow> </msup> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaamOzamaaCa aaleqabaWaaWbaaWqabeaacaGGNaaaaaaaaaa@37E7@ </annotation> </semantics> </math> are shown in the table above. The function f has a continuous second derivative for all real numbers.
content.question: (a) Use a midpoint Riemann sum with three subintervals of equal length indicated by the data in the table to approximate the value of <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>f</mi> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mn>6</mn> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaamOzaiaacI cacaaI2aGaaiykaaaa@38FA@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>.

frqParts.text: (a) Use a midpoint Riemann sum with three subintervals of equal length indicated by the data in the table to approximate the value of <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>f</mi> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mn>6</mn> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaamOzaiaacI cacaaI2aGaaiykaaaa@38FA@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>.

(b) Determine whether the actual value of <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>f</mi> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mn>6</mn> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaamOzaiaacI cacaaI2aGaaiykaaaa@38FA@ </annotation> </semantics> </math> could be 70. Explain your reasoning.

topic.text: 4.7: Using L'Hospital's Rule for Determining Limits of Indeterminate Forms

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
